KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Void compareLT 008
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGT compareGE compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT function to compare two objects and return the Boolean value, true or false. The values of each object are compared to determine whether the first object is lesser in value than the second object.

Syntax.Note: The uninitialized value of x is equal to #void.
The value #void is lesser than the value of the String.
